4.2 /5 (58 votes) Loading... Help Rufus to wait tables in this mexican restaurant.
Help Rufus the little Mexican boy in these restaurant girls games, who has opened a restaurant in this game for girls. There’s lots of mexican food like chocolate, salsa, burritos, cheese, nachos and soda. You must click on distributors for the contents to fall onto plates or into glasses to make up the orders of the customers that come into the restaurant, just like in other girls games in this section.
Don’t make mistakes in this cooking game! There are several levels of difficulty with waitress games . First, you will have only one dish on the tray and then you need to manage more of them as soon as possible. Now it’s up to you to prove yourself, Rufus really needs your help in this game for girls!
